message: Maybe it is a Chimera type human...I am, a twin died, and my body adsorbed the fetus, and the DNA. I also had a fraternal twin brother. We would of been triplets. Weird stuff... * Chimera: In medicine, a person composed of two genetically distinct types of cells. Human chimeras were first discovered with the advent of blood typing when it was found that some people had more than one blood type. Most of them proved to be """"blood chimeras"""" -- non-identical twins who shared a blood supply in the uterus. Those who were not twins are thought to have blood cells from a twin that died early in gestation. Twin embryos often share a blood supply in the placenta, allowing blood stem cells to pass from one and settle in the bone marrow of the other. About 8% of non-identical twin pairs are chimeras.

I really just want to know why Chris felt it necessary to comment on a post about two men getting married, just to basically tell them he does not approve (or Jesus or Satan or God doesn't approve, I dunno anymore). Why couldn't you have just seen this, said something to yourself, and moved on? What possessed you to make your initial post in the first place? Do you think after this couple reads it, they are going to quickly discover religion, get a divorce, and forever change their ways? What was your purpose for getting involved in the first place?
